message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000 for this exceptional item. This offer aims to provide you with a competitive advantage while ensuring you secure a high-quality asset at a reasonable cost. I look forward to your consideration.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $10,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. While I understand your budget constraints, I would like to extend an updated offer at $9,000 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a fair transaction for both parties. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
